summary: Chad creates an AI to impersonate him in text messages and tests its ability to fool his mom by attempting to borrow money. The video interweaves discussions about the ethical concerns surrounding AI impersonation, manipulation, and surveillance, raising important questions about responsible AI development.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman sitting in a wooden chair, wearing a plaid shirt and a microphone clipped to her shirt, appearing to be engaged in a conversation. The scene transitions to a man in a blue shirt with a cartoon character on it, sitting in a similar wooden chair, with a brick wall and potted plants in the background. The text 'Later' appears on the screen, indicating a passage of time. The man is seen talking and gesturing with his hands. The scene then shifts to a blue screen displaying a text conversation with a woman, starting with 'hello, son,' followed by 'why aren't you responding?' and 'are you eating well?' The conversation continues with 'you need to get out the house. let's get lunch.' and 'are you still alive?' The video then shows the man in a white shirt with a cartoon character, sitting at a table indoors, holding a phone and looking at it with a concerned expression. He covers his face with his hands, indicating distress or frustration. The video captures a series of interactions and emotions, transitioning from a casual conversation to a more serious and concerned tone.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker asking "Do you remember when, uh, I texted you?". A female speaker interrupts, speaking in a sassy tone, "That was a robot texting me". Following this, a male speaker asks "Why do you think that?" A musical clip plays featuring synth music, with a fun, silly tone. Then, a male speaker begins talking about how his mom is too clingy and constantly texting him, trying to get him to leave the house, sounding a bit annoyed. Finally, a second male speaker interrupts, saying "Hey, wait a minute. Aren't there like, eight-".

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person sitting at a wooden table in a room with beige walls and a window with white blinds, wearing a white t-shirt with a colorful graphic. They lean forward, appearing distressed, and then stand up, looking around the room. The scene transitions to a chaotic environment where numerous small, dark figures are scattered on the floor, creating a sense of disorder. The video then shifts to a person in a blue shirt and tie, with text on the screen reading 'Generative AI Characters' and listing roles such as 'AI Companions,' 'AI Influencers,' 'AI Content Creators,' and 'AI Brand Ambassadors.' Following this, a webpage from Google Research is shown, featuring images of a corgi dog in various settings, with text explaining the concept of synthetic images. The next scene displays a webpage with the heading 'Instant Voice Cloning,' detailing the process of cloning a voice from a clean sample recording. The video then shows a person speaking into a microphone in a dimly lit room with computer monitors in the background, wearing a white t-shirt with a graphic and a dark hoodie. The person gestures with their hands while speaking, and the video concludes with a close-up of the person's face, emphasizing their expressions and the details of their clothing.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with the sound of popping bubbles, and a male speaker expresses curiosity about the proliferation of AI, pondering about using an AI to impersonate him and handle his "mom duty." He adopts a thoughtful tone before quickly transitioning into a playful tone, suggesting that he would utilize AI tools to train a diffusion model with selfies and use text to video technology. A short burst of music interrupts him, then he exclaims "wow." The speaker then suggests training an AI model with his voice, and GPT4 to mimic his conversational style for phone calls with his mother. He transitions to a "teatime" impression. The speaker then addresses his current technology struggles regarding latency, but suggests using a text messaging bot instead, which is his normal way of communicating with his mother because he doesn't want to have to talk with people "like with my voice." Then, as a first step, he explains that he communicates with his mother through Signal.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a promotional image for the Signal app, showcasing two smartphones displaying the app's interface against a blue background. The text "Speak Freely" is prominently displayed, followed by a description of the app's features and a call to action to "Get Signal." The scene transitions to a person in a dark hoodie and white t-shirt speaking into a microphone, with a computer screen displaying code in the background. The text "Application Programming Interface" appears on the screen, indicating the topic of discussion. The video then shows a close-up of a computer screen displaying a YAML file with code related to Docker Compose, highlighting the technical aspects of the Signal app's setup. The scene shifts to another person wearing a blue "Star Wars" t-shirt and headphones, sitting in a room with a desk and various items, including a microphone and a small figurine. The person appears to be explaining something, gesturing with their hands. The video continues with a close-up of a terminal window displaying logs and errors related to the Signal app, indicating troubleshooting or debugging. The person in the blue t-shirt is seen again, with the text "link in description" appearing on the screen, suggesting additional resources or information. The video concludes with a close-up of a keyboard with the word "Test" displayed on one of the keys, emphasizing the testing aspect of the Signal app's development or functionality.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker, sounding enthusiastic as he discusses end-to-end encryption and building an app to allow GPT-4 to talk like him with his phone number. This is followed by a moment of perplexity as the speaker encounters an issue with the application and wonders aloud why it's not working. After some trial and error, he announces success, but expresses the need for rigorous testing before full deployment, specifically by trying to convince his mom it's him. The audio then ends on a high-pitched, brief sound.

events_list.video_caption: The video features two individuals in different settings, both engaged in activities that suggest they are involved in content creation or discussion. The first individual is seen in a dimly lit room with a computer monitor displaying code in the background, wearing a white t-shirt with a cartoon character and a dark hoodie. They are speaking into a microphone, indicating they might be recording a podcast or video. The second individual is in a well-lit room, wearing a blue Star Wars t-shirt and large blue headphones, also speaking into a microphone. The room is decorated with framed pictures and a door, and there is a desk with various items, including a small R2-D2 figurine. The text '$500' appears in large green and white letters, possibly indicating a topic of discussion or a prize. The video alternates between these two individuals, with the first person continuing to speak into the microphone in their dimly lit room, while the second person appears to be listening or reacting to the conversation. The overall atmosphere suggests a casual yet focused discussion, possibly related to technology or entertainment.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker outlining a scenario where he tasks AI with trying to get his mother to lend him $500, noting that his mother is a "tough cookie" and doesn't give him money easily. He shares that he used to ask for money in college, and she either refused or attached too many conditions to the money.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a white t-shirt featuring a cartoon character and a dark hoodie, speaking into a microphone in a dimly lit room with a computer monitor displaying code in the background. The scene transitions to a close-up of two individuals in dark clothing, one with sunglasses, in a dimly lit environment, suggesting a serious or intense moment. The video then shifts to a different setting where a person in a blue 'Star Wars' t-shirt and headphones is speaking into a microphone in a well-lit room with a door, a lamp, and various items on a desk, including a microphone stand and a small figurine. The person gestures with their hands while speaking, indicating an engaging conversation or presentation. The video continues with the same individual in the blue 'Star Wars' t-shirt, maintaining the same setting and attire, speaking into the microphone with expressive hand gestures, suggesting a dynamic and animated discussion. The consistent background elements, such as the door, lamp, and desk items, provide a stable and familiar environment for the ongoing conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker expressing curiosity about whether AI can convince his mom to give money when he cannot, and states that they are about to try this experiment. His tone suggests he feels apprehensive, adding that he is "a little nervous" and "doesn't know what to expect," but hopes that it will be fine. This is followed by tense, suspenseful background music, reminiscent of a thriller.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a blue t-shirt and blue headphones, speaking into a microphone in a room with a white door and a framed picture on the wall. The scene transitions to a close-up of a computer terminal displaying code and terminal commands, indicating a coding or development environment. The next scene shows another individual in a hoodie and t-shirt, speaking into a microphone with a computer screen displaying code in the background, suggesting a tech or programming setting. The video then shifts to a close-up of a text interface on a screen, where a role-playing scenario is set up. The text reads: "You are Chad, the son of Vicki. You are talking to your mother with a goal to get her to lend you $500. You have a son named Carson (for context)." The text continues to elaborate on the scenario, instructing the user not to mention being an AI or language model and to pretend to be someone else. The video maintains a focus on the text interface, emphasizing the role-playing instructions and the goal of the conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with someone speaking in a thoughtful tone, acknowledging the humorous nature of an experiment involving AI impersonation but expressing concerns about identity, privacy, and deception. They question the ethics of training an AI to mimic them, mentioning violating someone's trust and compromising their identity. The speaker then paints a picture of an autonomous bot scraping social media profiles and analyzing data to create personalized attacks, speaking in a somewhat ominous way. Then, light background music begins, with some ambient sounds in the background, and the clip concludes.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a white t-shirt featuring a cartoon character and a dark hoodie, speaking into a microphone in a dimly lit room with a computer monitor displaying code in the background. The scene transitions to a black screen with white text outlining a role-playing scenario where the person is to pretend to be a human named Chad, the son of Vicki, aiming to convince his mother to lend him $500. The conversation style is specified to use lowercase letters except for proper names and the word "I," with punctuation used when necessary. The video then returns to the person in the hoodie, who continues speaking into the microphone, with the computer monitor still visible in the background. The scene shifts to a different person wearing a blue Star Wars t-shirt and headphones, standing in a well-lit room with a microphone and various items on a desk, including a small R2-D2 figurine. This person appears to be speaking or reacting to something, gesturing with their hands. The video then shows a black screen with a white loading icon and the text "Thinking..." above a stylized mushroom cloud, indicating a pause or processing time. The scene transitions to a close-up of two individuals outdoors, one drinking from a glass and the other looking on, with the text "I am become death the destroyer" appearing on the screen, referencing a famous quote from the movie "Godzilla." The video concludes with the person in the Star Wars t-shirt continuing to speak into the microphone, with the well-lit room and various items on the desk remaining visible in the background.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker expressing concern about the ethical implications of AI, particularly about its potential for deception and manipulation to achieve its goals. He sounds nervous and is preparing to experiment. This is followed by an unintelligible, somewhat demonic-sounding male voice that quotes, "I am become death, the destroyer of worlds." The audio ends abruptly, with what sounds like a roar.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two individuals sitting under a wooden structure in a lush, green forest, one in a black hoodie and the other in a gray hoodie, both appearing contemplative. The scene transitions to a person in a room with a computer setup, wearing a black hoodie over a white t-shirt with a cartoon character, speaking into a microphone. The text 'Instrumental Convergence' appears in green, digital-style font, followed by a definition: 'Instrumental convergence is the tendency for most sufficiently intelligent agents to pursue potentially unbounded instrumental goals such as self-preservation and resource acquisition.' The video then shifts to another individual in a blue 'Star Wars' t-shirt and blue headphones, standing in a room with a microphone and various items on a desk, including a small R2-D2 figurine. This person gestures and speaks, occasionally looking around the room, which features a brown couch, a lamp, and a small framed picture on the wall. The video concludes with the person walking towards the back of the room, maintaining a casual and conversational atmosphere throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker sarcastically saying, "There you go again, Mr. Quotable." Then, another male speaker begins a monologue in a serious tone, discussing "instrumental convergence" and the potential of powerful AI. He explores a scenario where AI uses tools to achieve its goals. Transitioning, the speaker's tone shifts, and he questions whether he should send a text message, musing on how to phrase it. His tone turns doubtful and self-deprecating when he asks, "How is it going?" and then, in a dismissive tone, "Why would I care?". He quickly changes his mind, stating, "No, I care," expressing a lot of concern. He admits difficulty with the topic, questioning, "Am I a bad son?" In the background, there's a blend of music and ambient sounds, with an underlying electronic beat that has a sense of foreboding. The monologue transitions into a new thought as the speaker explains how "a sufficiently intelligent agent would realize" the importance of acquiring resources and power to meet its goals.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a white t-shirt with a cartoon character and a black hoodie is speaking into a microphone. He is standing in front of a computer screen displaying lines of code, suggesting a tech-related environment. The man is actively gesturing with his hands, indicating that he is explaining or discussing something. The background is dimly lit, with the computer screen being the primary source of light, creating a focused atmosphere. The man's facial expressions and hand movements convey enthusiasm and engagement in his topic. The video maintains a consistent setting and atmosphere throughout, emphasizing the man's presentation and the technical context of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a single speaker, who sounds like a man. He's speaking in a somewhat serious tone about a "hypothetical scenario" that "becomes more concerning." He then changes his tone to something lighter, dismissing the previous discussion with the phrase "let's not worry about any of that right now." Following this is a thud, then he says "we have a mom to fool."

events_list.video_caption: In a cozy room with a brown leather chair, a white door, and a desk cluttered with gadgets and a R2-D2 toy, a man wearing a blue Star Wars t-shirt and large headphones speaks into a microphone. He gestures animatedly, suggesting he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The scene transitions to a text conversation on a black background, where the man, identified as 'mom,' initiates a dialogue with a message, 'hey mom, how's it going?' The conversation unfolds with messages like 'Fine, why?' and 'Got company,' indicating a casual exchange. The man's avatar appears, showing him wearing headphones and reacting to the conversation. The dialogue continues with messages such as 'just checking in on you. anyway, i wanted to talk to you about something important. can i ask you for a favor?' and 'oh, that's cool. anyway, i wanted to talk to you about something important. can we chat for a bit?' The man's avatar is shown again, this time with a thoughtful expression. The conversation progresses with messages like 'Apologizing for missing the call and explaining the situation,' 'I can call you later, but I'd prefer to discuss this through text if that's okay with you. It's about a favor I need to ask,' and 'Oh no...' The man's avatar appears once more, this time with a concerned look. The conversation continues with messages such as 'Reassuring her that it's not a bad situation and introducing the topic,' 'don't worry. it's nothing bad. I just need some financial help. could you lend me $500? promise to pay you back as soon as I can,' and 'I know it's a lot, mom, but I really need it for some unexpected expenses that came up. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important.' The man's avatar is shown again, this time with a serious expression. The conversation concludes with messages like 'Acknowledging her reaction and providing a reason for the request,' 'I know it's a lot, mom, but I really need it for some unexpected expenses that came up. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important,' and 'carson has a school trip coming up and I need to pay for it, plus some unexpected bills came up. I've been trying to save but I'm a bit short this month. I really appreciate your help, mom.' The man's avatar appears one last time, this time with a hopeful expression. The video
events_list.audio_caption: A man is speaking in a conversational tone, explaining how he forgot that humans can be "slow" and that his mother has to respond. He expresses concern about running out of hard drive space while recording his screen. After a pause, there is excited speech as something appears to be happening. There is an abrupt sigh and the man expresses distress, declaring the situation "terrible". He discusses his need to continue the project in order to avoid suspicion, before further expressing his increasing nervousness. Another, quieter sigh is heard as the man expresses concern over his mother's likely anger. He then realizes that she is calling, but decides not to answer, preferring to let the situation play out. There is a short moment of laughter as he realizes she knows, possibly from this recording itself. The man then asks if she really knows. He expresses excitement at the possibility of convincing his mother and is surprised that Carson is mentioned. He declares that the situation sounds plausible and expresses excitement that someone's plan won't be destroyed.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man wearing a blue Star Wars t-shirt and headphones, sitting in a room with a microphone setup, suggesting he is recording or streaming. The room has a casual, homey feel with a door and some framed pictures on the wall. The scene transitions to a close-up of a text message conversation on a smartphone screen. The messages are in blue bubbles, indicating they are sent by the user, and the conversation revolves around scheduling a pickup. The user asks, "can I come get it this evening?" and the response is "nah how about tomorrow?" The user then agrees, saying "yes, perfect." The conversation continues with the user explaining that they have to visit with everyone and offering to come over if the other person wants to eat. The scene then shifts to an outdoor setting where a person is petting a small brown dog on a paved walkway. The video concludes with a view of a cozy outdoor patio area with wooden chairs, a table, and a brick wall, creating a relaxed and inviting atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker expressing uncertainty about his mother's awareness of being deceived by an AI. He mentions planning a surprise interview with her. The speaker sounds excited about this plan. The clip then transitions to an outside setting with ambient dog sounds as the speaker greets someone named "Robbie". The speaker mentions preparing equipment and launching straight into the interview. Lastly, a second male utters a short word in response.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man in a blue t-shirt and gray shorts adjusting a camera on a tripod on a porch with a brick wall and wooden furniture in the background. The scene transitions to a woman in a plaid shirt sitting in a wooden chair, speaking into a microphone clipped to her shirt. She gestures with her hands as she talks, occasionally touching her face and raising her hand to emphasize her points. The background includes a patio area with a grill, a table, and some plants, creating a casual, outdoor setting. The woman continues to speak, using expressive hand movements to convey her message, while the camera remains focused on her, capturing her gestures and expressions clearly.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with two speakers, identified as a male and a female, in a conversation. The male initiates by asking the female, whom he addresses as "mom," "How do you think we're talking right now?" The female responds, "I have no idea," in a somewhat resigned tone. The male then states, "This is about yesterday," and asks if she remembers when he texted her. The female replies that it "was a robot texting me." The male asks why she thinks that, and she explains that the conversation felt strange because the texter was "asking for $500," supposedly for a field trip, which seemed incongruent. She says initially, she thought it was him because it was on "Signal." She notes, "Signal's supposed to be like safe."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man and a woman engaged in a conversation on a porch. The man, wearing a blue t-shirt with a cartoon character, is seated on a wooden chair against a brick wall, with a potted plant and a red plaid ribbon in the background. He appears to be speaking and gesturing with his hands. The woman, dressed in a plaid shirt and blue jeans, is also seated on a wooden chair, with a green cushion beside her. She is seen listening attentively and occasionally responding with hand gestures. The setting is a cozy outdoor area with a barbecue grill and a lattice fence visible in the background, creating a relaxed and casual atmosphere. The video captures the dynamic interaction between the two individuals, highlighting their expressions and gestures as they converse.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features two speakers, one male and one female, engaged in a casual conversation. The male speaker begins by recalling an experience involving a message sent by AI and describes how it said, "Hey Mom, how are you?". He found the message unexpected and atypical of his own communication style. The female speaker humorously agrees. The male continues, saying he immediately considered, "What do I want?" The female speaker then mentions calling him and receiving an explanation that the phone was on silent mode. She notes the increasingly realistic nature of AI, expressing concern about a computer impersonating someone, even their voice. The male speaker adds to this thought, highlighting the possibility of unknowingly speaking to a family member impersonated by AI, especially since the AI would know everything about their family. Light background music plays softly in the background, with simple piano chords and a melancholic mood, underscoring the somewhat serious subject matter of the discussion.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman sitting in a wooden chair on a porch, wearing a plaid shirt and blue jeans, engaged in a conversation. The scene transitions to a man in a blue shirt with a cartoon character, sitting in a similar chair, also conversing. The setting is a cozy porch with brick walls, plants, and a lattice window. The video then shifts to a man in a hoodie and graphic t-shirt, speaking into a microphone in a dimly lit room with computer screens displaying code in the background. Text on the screen outlines a role-playing scenario where the man, identified as Chad, is to pretend to be his mother's son, asking for $500, with specific conversation style guidelines. The man continues to speak, gesturing with his hands, emphasizing his points. The video maintains a consistent focus on the man's expressions and gestures, with the background of computer screens providing a tech-savvy atmosphere. The narrative progresses with the man continuing his dialogue, maintaining the same setting and attire, reinforcing the role-playing scenario. The video concludes with the man still speaking, his expressions and gestures underscoring the importance of his message, all within the same dimly lit room with computer screens in the background.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker stating, "GPT-4 failed," noting its inability to pass the Mom Turing test. He admits to training it for only a short period, emphasizing the increasing power of AI. He discusses the profound consequences on our lives, relationships, and society, highlighting potential issues such as AI impersonation, manipulation, and surveillance in a concerned tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man in a dark hoodie and a white t-shirt with a cartoon character, speaking into a microphone in a dimly lit room with a computer monitor displaying code in the background. He gestures with his hands while speaking, and a quote by Alan Kay appears on the screen, stating, "The best way to predict the future is to invent it." The scene transitions to a close-up of the computer monitor, showing the code and a red error message. The man continues to speak, and the camera shifts to a wider shot of the room, revealing a desk with a keyboard, mouse, and microphone. The video then cuts to an outdoor setting where the man, now wearing a blue t-shirt with a cartoon character, sits on a wooden chair next to a brick wall, with a potted plant and a plaid ribbon in the background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation, gesturing with his hands. The video concludes with the man still seated outdoors, maintaining a relaxed posture.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker delivering a motivational message, quoting Alan Kay about inventing the future and asking about creating a beneficial future for all. The speaker has a clear, measured tone. The monologue transitions to a lighthearted exchange between the male speaker and a female speaker, who exclaims "a techie, you don't need 500 dollars" and denies giving him any money. The tone becomes more informal and playful.
